overview: Gandalf, Entombed, Carcass and Cadaver Inc. headline this heavy-duty metalfest from Earache Records, purveyors of doom metal, grindcore, death metal and other hard-core genres. The compilation features a combination of videos and archival performance footage of macabre songs such as Mortiis' "Parasite God," Linea 77's "Ketchup Suicide," Cathedral's "Black Sunday," the Haunted's "Bury Your Dead" and more.
title: iCrusher
